item.title: WebGL tutorial: image processing
item.description: In this tutorial you will learn how to use the power of GPU from javascript. With some WebGL shader examples such as blur and twist.

item.title: First impressions on Rust and Webassembly
item.description: I implemented Conway’s Game of Life to familiarize myself with this setup. Controls should be self-explanatory. You can also draw on a field. (Drawing only works from PC, not from mobile devices)

item.title: About
item.description: Hi, my name is Nikita. Currently I work as an Embedded software engineer. Also, have some experience with Fullstack web development. This is just a small blog where I will document my exploration of interesting technologies. I hope it will help me to retain my motivation more easily. Also, I am planning to showcase some projects here soon. Too many projects worth sharing are now buried with old hard drives.
